discharge_note:
Dear valued pet owner,

We are pleased to inform you that Darth Vader, your Chihuahua, has made a significant recovery since his last visit. According to our clinical notes, he has been doing a lot better, with his cough having stopped, and he has started running and playing again. His appetite has also returned, and he is eating his food without any issues.

We have recorded a consultation on 21st February 2025, which included a consultation procedure. The total cost for this procedure was £64.50.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further concerns or questions about Darth Vader's health. We are always here to help.

Thank you for entrusting us with your pet's care.

Sincerely,
The Veterinary Team
